code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import api from"../services/api.js";import"../styles/UserManagement.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const UserManagement=()=>{const[users,setUsers]=useState([]);const[newUser,setNewUser]=useState({name:"",email:""});useEffect(()=>{api.get("/users").then(res=>setUsers(res.data));},[]);const handleAdd=async()=>{const res=await api.post("/users",newUser);setUsers([...users,res.data]);setNewUser({name:"",email:""});};const handleDelete=async id=>{await api.delete(`/users/${id}`);setUsers(users.filter(u=>u._id!==id));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Qu\u1EA3n l\xFD Ng\u01B0\u1EDDi d\xF9ng"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{placeholder:"T\xEAn ng\u01B0\u1EDDi d\xF9ng",value:newUser.name,onChange:e=>setNewUser({...newUser,name:e.target.value})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{placeholder:"Email",value:newUser.email,onChange:e=>setNewUser({...newUser,email:e.target.value})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleAdd,children:"Th\xEAm"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("table",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("thead",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"T\xEAn"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Email"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"H\xE0nh \u0111\u1ED9ng"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{children:users.map(user=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:user.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:user.email}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"action-btn",onClick:()=>handleDelete(user._id),children:"Xo\xE1"})})]},user._id))})]})]});};export default UserManagement;
